languages.text: "Прежде, чем я приму твои извинения — расскажи, кто ты такой, и зачем проник на корабль".
"Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."
languages.original_text: "Прежде, чем я приму твои извинения — расскажи, кто ты такой, и зачем проник на корабль".

traits.locale_text: "Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."
"Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."
"Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."
"Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."
"Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."

languages.text: 「謝罪を受け入れる前に、あなたが誰なのか、そしてなぜ私の船に侵入したのかを説明してほしい」
languages.original_text: "Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."

traits.locale_text: 「謝罪を受け入れる前に、あなたが誰なのか、そしてなぜ私の船に侵入したのかを説明してほしい」

languages.text: “你是谁？你为什么潜入我的飞船？先告诉我答案，之后我再接受你的道歉。”
languages.original_text: "Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."

traits.locale_text: “你是谁？你为什么潜入我的飞船？先告诉我答案，之后我再接受你的道歉。”

languages.text: "Bevor ich Eure Entschuldigung annehmen, sagt mir, wer Ihr seid und warum Ihr mein Schiff infiltriert habt."
languages.original_text: "Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Bevor ich Eure Entschuldigung annehmen, sagt mir, wer Ihr seid und warum Ihr mein Schiff infiltriert habt."

languages.text: « Avant que j'accepte vos excuses, dites-moi qui vous êtes et pourquoi vous vous êtes introduit à bord de mon vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."

traits.locale_text: « Avant que j'accepte vos excuses, dites-moi qui vous êtes et pourquoi vous vous êtes introduit à bord de mon vaisseau. »

languages.text: «Antes de aceptar sus disculpas, dígame quién es y por qué se ha infiltrado en mi nave».
languages.original_text: "Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de aceptar sus disculpas, dígame quién es y por qué se ha infiltrado en mi nave».

languages.text: "Özrünü kabul etmeden evvel kim olduğunu ve neden gemime izinsiz ayak bastığını söyle."
languages.original_text: "Before I accept your apologies, tell me who you are and why you infiltrated my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Özrünü kabul etmeden evvel kim olduğunu ve neden gemime izinsiz ayak bastığını söyle bana."
